title: Google\Cloud\Video\Stitcher\V1\ManifestOptions
name: ManifestOptions
description:
Options for manifest generation.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.video.stitcher.v1.ManifestOptions

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.include_renditions
params.description: If specified, the output manifest will only return renditions matching the specified filters.

params.name: data.bitrate_order
params.description: If specified, the output manifest will orders the video and muxed renditions by bitrate according to the ordering policy.
